title: Mohsin Naqvi pays tribute to Martyr Major Rab Nawaz during visit to Muzaffarabad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 27 (APP):Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi visited the residence of Shaheed Major Rab Nawaz in Muzaffarabad today. He met with the father, brother, and other family members of the martyred Major.
Mohsin Naqvi expressed heartfelt condolences on the martyrdom of Major Rab Nawaz and prayed for the elevation of his ranks.
The Interior Minister paid rich tribute to the valor and heroism of Shaheed Major Rab Nawaz and lauded the courage and determination of his father and brother. He said that a nation with such brave parents can never be defeated by its enemies.
He highlighted that Major Rab Nawaz laid down his life for the homeland while fighting bravely against the terrorists of Fitna-e-Hindustan. He is a true hero of the nation and will always remain alive in our hearts.
“We stand with the families of our martyrs and will always continue to do so. The martyrs of this nation have nurtured peace with their precious blood, and the entire nation takes immense pride in their supreme sacrifices,” the Minister stated.
Major Rab Nawaz embraced martyrdom a few days ago while bravely confronting terrorists of Fitna-e-Hindustan in the Awaran area of Balochistan.
